definitions.definition: A tropical evergreen tree, Blighia sapida , related to the lychee and longan .
The fruit of the tree, of which only the arils are edible , the remainder being poisonous .
examples: Ackee and saltfish is a traditional Jamaican dish.

main_definition: A tropical evergreen tree, Blighia sapida , related to the lychee and longan .
secondary_definitions: The fruit of the tree, of which only the arils are edible , the remainder being poisonous .
